description:
Tokino Sora is a http://anidb.net/cr62844 [virtual YouTuber] that has also starred in anime. Debuting on September 7, 2017, she is the first Virtual Idol of Hololive Production.
She loves singing and horror games, and her dream has been to "hold a live concert at Yokohama Arena" since the very beginning.
Source: Hololive Production
name: Tokino Sora
